events.message: I recently purchased a laptop charger from your store, but it stopped working within two days. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message has been reviewed and the issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah Thompson for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'll be helping you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number and any proof of purchase?
To process the refund, I need you to send a photo of the receipt and confirm the payment method used for the purchase.
Here is my order number: 123456789 and a photo of the receipt attached. The payment was made using my credit card last week.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund to your credit card within 5-7 business days. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate your quick response and the clear instructions. I look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been completed from our side. Please expect the funds within a week. Let us know if you need any more help.
We are checking in to confirm if you have received your refund. Please reply to this message if you have any further concerns.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your assistance throughout the process.
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing the case now, and thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to fill out this satisfaction survey so we can continue improving our service.
